TopicTitle: I Still Call Kerbin Home Project! Keyboard Player!!!

Articles.Content:
xXLeGoldFishXx and myself are currently working on a song and we have hit a hurdle. Goldfish and myself are looking for someone who is very experienced and knows how to play a Keyboard or Piano and know how to do it also we would like Someone who has some way of recording it in clear quality.

If you are interested please Pm myself for the song you will be playing and for any further questions.

-L3GO

![kP2yruA.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/kP2yruA.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-20T10:44:23Z" title="02/20/2015 10:44  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 20, 2015</time> by L3GO**
Yeah, if you can help us out, we'd really appreciate it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I'll be happy to give you a hand if nobody else with more experience with keyboards than me comes by.
Not sure how to pm here, but yeah, I could record some keys for you. Not sure what level of skill you want but I'd be happy to give it a go! Soundcloud.com/kantpredict

Hi

I only can play a tiny bit of keyboard but i can play guitar (im beginner/intermediate)

But i dont have recording equipment yet though

I have many years of piano experience, are you looking for improv stuff or is there sheet music to go with it? Also, I have a very nice electric piano to hand which I can easily hook up to the PC to record without background noise.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-20T16:14:02Z" title="02/20/2015 04:14  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 20, 2015</time> by Chickenkeeper**

I had been playing piano for a long time, I can help if you want. But I'm not sure on how well I can record, I have just basic stuff (a keyboard and a nice software), anyway I can ask some friend for better stuff.

I play piano since I was 5 , got up to grade 8 standard, have done my own composition on computer, use midi keyboards and FLStudio. what exactly is required? I do not have much time these days since I started my new job.
Thanks for the replies guys i will talk this over with xXLeGoldFishXx and get back to you all.
I could probably do it, I'd need more details on what exactly you need though.
